title: Tufto's Author Page
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include component:pride-highlighter inc-lgbt= --]]]

This is the author page of [[*user Tufto]], one of the Wiki's leading Z-list skip authors.

Apologies if I do not reply to messages promptly, I have a bad habit of seeing one and forgetting to reply to it for days/weeks/forever.

Also apologies to translators for changing this page around so many times!

-----
